Text:
one of the best action movie imho. thx for u/l

a 9
v 8

Pizza Hut!?!  I had really hoped this would be the Taco Bell version...

I'd never heard of Taco Bell before I saw Demolition Man, but I pretty much grasped straight away that it was a restaurant franchise... why on earth they changed it to Pizza Hut for the European release I'll never know!

Some people might find the dubbing hilarious, but I love Demolition Man, and think it's a great movie, please, please bring back Taco Bell.

This is exactly the same Pizza Hut version as the earlier BOZX KiNGS release:

https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6117716

I haven't tried the anoXmous release yet:

https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6604302
anoxmous' torrent is the same as this torrent. he uploaded it to try and annoy me because he's so grown up lol.
